IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The Masonic and Eastern Star home is a CHARITABLE LONG-TERM CARE FACILITY which provides food, lodging and medicine for its elderly residents.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The Masonic and Eastern Star home is a CHARITABLE LONG-TERM CARE FACILITY which provides food, lodging and medicine for its elderly residents.
IRS990.Desc: THE MASONIC AND EASTERN STAR HOME IS IN OPERATION TO PROVIDE FOOD, LODGING, MEDICINE AND OTHER NEEDS FOR ELDERLY RESIDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FUNDS ARE DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD TO BE USED FOR EXPENSES RELATED TO PROVIDINGCARE TO LIFE-CARE RESIDENTS AND FOR THE MESH CARE PROGRAM. The MESH Care program provides a subsidy to cover the cost of care above the residents available resources.

The Organization follows the provisions of the Income Tax Topic of the FASB Accounting Standards Codification relating to unrecognized tax benefits. This standard requires an entity to recognize a liability for tax positions when there is a 50% or greater likelihood that the position will not be sustained upon examination. The Organization is liable for taxes to the extent of any unrelated business income as defined by the IRS regulations. The Organization believes that is has not generated any unrelated business income as defined by IRS regulations and that it is more likely than not that this position would be sustained upon examination. As such, there were no liabilities recorded for uncertain tax positions as of April 30, 2023.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Grantmaker's Description of How Grants are Used
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: These funds are monitored by completing a detailed assessment of each recipient. This assessment evaluates the recipients functioning in the home, social supports, finances, and available community resources. Ongoing monitoring occurs to ensure all needs are being met and services are appropriate. Case updates and contacts between OutReach and Recipient are documented in the FAMCare documentation system. To ensure accountability, after a check is issued the recipient sends documentation (receipt/copy of invoice) and caregiver timesheet (if applicable) for the case file.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization is being managed by Aidan Health Services, Inc. Aidan has taken over the day-to-day operations.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: the members of the masonic and eastern star home are the grand lodge of the ancient free and accepted masons of oregon and the grand chapter of oregon, order of the eastern star.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: the grand lodge may elect five members to the board and the eastern star may elect two.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: rules and regulations for management, control and operation of the home and for reception of residents therein may be adpoted by the board. they are subject to approval by the grand master and grand matron.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY BOTH MANAGEMENT AND THE BOARD PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICTS ARE REGULARLY MONITORED BY THE BOARD AND BY THE ORGANIZATION'S MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT REVIEWS MARKET COMPARIBILITY STUDIES. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PERFORMANCE AND APPROVES PAY INCREASES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE ORGANIZATION'S BUSINESS OFFICE.
